text: Pioneer Island is part of the Severnaya Zemlya group in the Russian Arctic. It measures in area. The island was discovered by Georgy Ushakov and Nikolay Urvantsev during their 1930-32 expedition. This island contains the Pioneer Glacier. title: Pioneer Island (Russia)
